Introduction

Youzin (유진) ( formerly known as Song Eyaki (송이야기)) is a South Korean singer currently under Blue Fox Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group Blue Fox and formerly a member of the groups ACE and BaBa, under the stage names Youjin (유진) and Jinri (진리), respectively.
